newsitem.title: UK: N. Sea Brent Sullom Voe terminal fully operational.
newsitem.headline: N. Sea Brent Sullom Voe terminal fully operational.

text.p: The North Sea Sullom Voe Brent crude terminal was fully operational on Wednesday morning after reopening on Tuesday night, an official at the port said.
"We are fully operational and loading three ships at the moment," he said.
The terminal had been closed for a day due to high winds but the short-term weather forecast was good and he did not expect to see the terminal closed over the next few days, he added.
